metadata.title: CVE-2015-8985 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: The pop_fail_stack function in the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6)allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (assertionfailure and application crash) via vectors related to extended regularexpression processing.

criterions.comment: eglibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
